name: oracular_8-ball_of_data_mining
description:
As you pick up the Oracular 8-Ball of Data Mining, you realize there is way more power contained inside than previous generations used to get to faraway places like Luna.  The ability to summon your friends, family, and acquaintances?  The power to almost-instantly crunch numbers?

The ability to play Whilst with fellow wayfarers while wisely waiting for the waters to wane while fording a waterway?  (Just don't call the knaves "jacks".)

Pretty nifty.
